ELEMENT.CREATOR: STAFF
ELEMENT.TITLE: Spacious Lines
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: Company Name IMAGEe (560x100) Product Listing Welcome Message
ELEMENT.SHORT: This layout will draw your customer's eyes to the products. It uses a 560x100 picture. A collage would look great here.

ELEMENT.HELP: Please select a front page picture for your site.
Please enter your company name as it should appear throughout your site
Please enter a Welcome message that will appear on your front page
ELEMENT.DEFAULT: Hello, welcome to our wonderful website!
ELEMENT.HELPER: Remember to keep this text short and to the point. If this is too long, or not helpful visitors probably won't go any further. A lot of businesses talk about what makes their products unique, or their excellent customer service. If you have neither of those, then consider simply welcoming the customer.

ELEMENT.HELP: You can add products to your homepage, when you do they will appear below.
